quote_last: . He put down his drink, and ran out of the apartment.
quote_raw: He glanced at his watch: 11:38. He put down his drink, and ran out of the apartment.
title: Cometh the Hour
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: , she left her desk and walked to the side door of the auditorium, arriving ten minutes before noon.
quote_raw: At 11:38, she left her desk and walked to the side door of the auditorium, arriving ten minutes before noon.
title: The Circle
author: Dave Eggers
